text: Manuel Mandel was a rower from Brazil. Mandel competed at the 1980 Summer Olympics and the 1984 Summer Olympics. He was born on 30 September 1936 and died on 27 September 2009.Manuel Mandel == References == Category:1936 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Brazilian rowers Category:Olympians for Brazil Category:Sportspeople from Rio de Janeiro
title: Manuel Mandel
